ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.description: An interface to build machine learning models for classification and regression problems. 'mikropml' implements the ML pipeline described by Topçuoğlu et al. (2020) <doi:10.1128/mBio.00434-20> with reasonable default options for data preprocessing, hyperparameter tuning, cross-validation, testing, model evaluation, and interpretation steps. See the website <http://www.schlosslab.org/mikropml/> for more information, documentation, and examples.
about.summary: User-Friendly R Package for Supervised Machine Learning Pipelines

about.description: An interface to build machine learning models for classification and regression problems. 'mikropml' implements the ML pipeline described by Topçuoğlu et al. (2020) <doi:10.1128/mBio.00434-20> with reasonable default options for data preprocessing, hyperparameter tuning, cross-validation, testing, model evaluation, and interpretation steps. See the website <http://www.schlosslab.org/mikropml/> for more information, documentation, and examples.
about.summary: User-Friendly R Package for Supervised Machine Learning Pipelines

name: r-mikropml
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.6.2" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-mikropml
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/mikropml_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/mikropml/mikropml_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 3957047dfe17c0d4f74306c6d29e18f01aa6a0c39f6383183e48f09e292ef09c

build:
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-mlmetrics
    - r-caret
    - r-dplyr
    - r-e1071
    - r-glmnet
    - r-kernlab
    - r-randomforest
    - r-rlang
    - r-xgboost
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-mlmetrics
    - r-caret
    - r-dplyr
    - r-e1071
    - r-glmnet
    - r-kernlab
    - r-randomforest
    - r-rlang
    - r-xgboost

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('mikropml')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('mikropml')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: http://www.schlosslab.org/mikropml/
  dev_url: https://github.com/SchlossLab/mikropml
  license: MIT
  summary: User-Friendly R Package for Supervised Machine Learning Pipelines
  description: An interface to build machine learning models for classification and regression problems. 'mikropml' implements the ML pipeline described by Topçuoğlu et al. (2020) <doi:10.1128/mBio.00434-20> with reasonable default options for data preprocessing, hyperparameter tuning, cross-validation, testing, model evaluation,
    and interpretation steps. See the website <http://www.schlosslab.org/mikropml/> for more information, documentation, and examples.
  license_family: MIT
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/MIT
    - LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - kelly-sovacool
